name: Halloween Street Simulator: For Those who can’t go out
name_original: Halloween Street Simulator: For Those who can’t go out
description: *This game gets fast so those who get MOTION SICKNESS easily be aware* You are walking down the street collecting candy from houses that are giving them out. The only thing keeping you going is the candy(Choc’o Meter) which if you run out you crash and lose. Your Goal is to get the longest walk(Highest score) as possible .
